text.title: Five dead after bar attack in Bamako, Mali
text.head: Five dead after bar attack in Bamako, Mali
Sources

list.item: Faith Karimi, Katarina Hoije. "Report: Jihadist group says it carried out attack that killed five at Mali bar" — CNN , March 8, 2015
"Mali bar attack kills five in Bamako" — BBC News Online , March 7, 2015
David Chazan. "Five dead including Frenchman and Belgian in Mali restaurant terror attack" — The Daily Telegraph , March 7. 2015
